caption.p: The ARI of M1 chronological signatures in each period. The X-axis shows the periods; the Y-axis indicates the ARI. Several signatures show a marked increase in ARI during 1978–2009 and 2010–2013: M1–30, 116, 142, 207, 209, and 214. M1–30, 116 and 142 are located in the membrane binding region; 207, 209 and 214, in the RNP binding region.
